original_title: President Ranil Wickremesinghe to visit India
original_body_lines: Ranil Wickremesinghe will visit India on an official visit on 21 July 2023 making his first visit to India since assuming the current responsibilities, India’s Ministry of External Affairs said.
Wickremesinghe will visit India at the invitation of Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi, the President of Sri Lanka
During his visit, President Wickremesinghe will meet President Smt. Droupadi Murmu and hold discussions with the Prime Minister and other Indian dignitaries on a range of issues of mutual interest.
